name: Request-Reply Pattern
description: Demonstrates the Request-Reply Enterprise Integration Pattern using a Customer Credit Check System scenario
author: VIZED Examples

routes.description: Main route that processes loan applications and performs credit checks
Mock credit bureau service that responds to credit check requests
Health check endpoint for monitoring service status

endpoints.description: Primary REST API endpoint for loan application submission
Web interface for testing loan applications
Batch processing directory for bulk loan application files
Output directory for processed loan decisions

businessScenario.description: A loan processing system that needs to check customer credit scores with a credit bureau before making loan approval decisions. This demonstrates the Request-Reply pattern where the system sends customer data to a credit service and waits for a response containing credit score and recommendation.
benefits: Synchronous processing ensures loan decisions are based on current credit data
Reliable request-reply communication with timeout handling
Clear separation between request preparation and response processing
Scalable pattern for integrating with external services

sampleData.description: Sample loan applications with customer data that will be processed through credit checks
